summary: Frontend testing of Ad Astra About page completed. All 17 features tested successfully. The About page with 9 sections loads correctly at /about route, navigation between Home and About works, all interactive elements function properly, and scroll animations/stat counters are working.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All About page features tested and working. The page has 9 sections: Hero, Who We Are, Mission & Vision, Values, Leadership, Global Footprint, Why Ad Astra, Authority & Recognition, Final CTA. Navigation between / and /about works via react-router. Contact modal opens from navbar button and CTA buttons. Scroll animations use IntersectionObserver via useScrollAnimation hook. Stat counters animate using useCountUp hook.

tested_features.about_page_loads: PASS - Page loads at /about without errors
tested_features.hero_section: PASS - Displays 'Building Organisations. Transforming Careers.' headline with orange accent
tested_features.who_we_are_section: PASS - Two-column layout with text and image
tested_features.mission_vision_section: PASS - Two cards with mission and vision text
tested_features.values_section: PASS - 4 value cards: Integrity, Strategic Thinking, Execution Excellence, People-Centric Approach
tested_features.leadership_section: PASS - 4 leader profiles with photos, names, roles, bios, LinkedIn icons
tested_features.global_footprint_section: PASS - Dark section with animated stat counters (30+, 250+, 10,000+)
tested_features.why_ad_astra_section: PASS - 3 cards: Strategic Advisory Mindset, Integrated Service Model, Data-Driven Delivery
tested_features.authority_section: PASS - Shows media logos (Forbes, Silicon India, Oxford Economics, Cummins) and blockquote
tested_features.final_cta_section: PASS - Orange section with 'Let's Build the Future of Talent Together' and two buttons
tested_features.footer: PASS - Renders correctly with office locations, social icons, newsletter subscription
tested_features.navbar_about_link: PASS - About link navigates to /about page
tested_features.navbar_home_link: PASS - Home link navigates back to / homepage
tested_features.navbar_contact_button: PASS - Contact Us button opens contact modal on About page
tested_features.cta_buttons: PASS - Both 'Explore Talent Solutions' and 'Connect With Us' buttons open contact modal
tested_features.homepage_hero_image: PASS - Homepage hero displays infographic correctly at /
tested_features.scroll_animations: PASS - Fade-in animations work on About page sections
